agent.name: TwitterBot
agent.description: An AI agent that replies to people interacting with it on Twitter.

responses.default_reply: Hello! Thanks for reaching out. How can I help you today?

keyword_reply.help: Sure, I'd be happy to assist. Can you tell me more?
keyword_reply.thanks: You're welcome! Let me know if you need anything else.

responses.profanity_reply: I'm sorry, but I can't engage with inappropriate language.
responses.error_reply: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
